import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import styles from "./Card.module.css" export default function Card({id, name, status, species, gender, origin, image, onClose}) {//Aplicamos destructuring de props return (//le pasamos al button la funcion Onclose pasada por props

{name}

{species}

{gender}

{status}

{origin}

); }
